page.title: 07EDUCATION - VILLAGE SCHOOL.
page.content: There were three teachers employed,an infant teacher,a part time teacher and a teaching head. The most recent headteacher was called{Mrs Bell}and when the school closed she was transfered down to{Rosebank}First School in Burley. When the school first opened{sixty-six children}went but when{Burley Middle}school opened the number went down to forty-six. The children started at the school at five and finished at eleven years old. Of the{forty six children,}only{six} came from Burley Woodhead. Both games lessons and playtimes were held on the nearby moor. Dinners were brought up in heated tins by a lady called{Mrs {Myers}who served them and then washed up. Since{1974}the building has been used as a Countryside centre for teachers and school children.
